person.name: Zak Cole
person.title: Ethereum Core Developer
person.bio_short: Ethereum protocol engineer, founder of Ethereum Community Foundation, CEO of Number Group. Three successful Web3 exits. Marine veteran building ETH to $10K.
person.bio_long: Zak Cole is an Ethereum protocol engineer and serial entrepreneur who has founded multiple successful blockchain companies. As founder and CEO of the Ethereum Community Foundation (ECF), he leads initiatives to strengthen Ethereum's ecosystem. Through Number Group, his venture studio, he builds infrastructure for the next generation of Web3 applications. Cole authored EIP-6968 (Contract Secured Revenue) and created $BETH, an immutable ERC-20 token representing provably burned ETH. His companies Code4rena, Slingshot Finance, and Whiteblock were all successfully acquired. A former Google engineer and Marine Corps veteran who served in Iraq, Cole combines technical expertise with operational excellence.

current_roles.description: Leading initiatives to take ETH to $10,000
